Reports.Value:
Click on the report groups to show the available reports.

Long reports, or reports which are to be formatted for printing, can be displayed in a separate window. To display a report in a separate window click the Show this report in a new window link.

ReportClass.Value: Booking reports provide information about online orders. Consignment reports provide information about deliveries.

Report.Value:
The Booking History report shows details of online orders made within a selected period.

Select the report period required by specifying the start and end date in the format shown.

Click the calendar icon or use the date dropdown boxes to select the report dates.

Click generate report to retrieve data. Sort displayed data by clicking on column headers.

Click re-select report filter to change the reporting period.

The Item Booking History report shows each item in each online order made within a selected period.

Select the report period required by specifying the start and end date in the format shown.

Click the calendar icon or use the date dropdown boxes to select the report dates.

Click generate report to retrieve data. Sort displayed data by clicking on column headers.

Click re-select report filter to change the reporting period.

The Detailed Booking History report is a downloadable report showing summary information and a breakdown of the items in the booking in each online order made within a selected period.

Select the report period required by specifying the start and end date in the format shown.

Click the calendar icon or use the date dropdown boxes to select the report dates.

Click generate report to retrieve data. Sort displayed data by clicking on column headers.

Click re-select report filter to change the reporting period.

The Consignments by Consignee report shows product deliveries within a selected period grouped by Consignee.

Select the report period required by specifying the start and end date from the dropdown boxes, then click the Run button.

The Consignment Cost report shows the total value of each consignment within a selected period.

Select the report period required by specifying the start and end date in the format shown.

Click the calendar icon or use the date dropdown boxes to select the report dates.

Click generate report to retrieve data. Click the Information button to display details of an individual consignment. Sort displayed data by clicking on column headers.

Click re-select report filter to change the reporting period.

The Cancelled Bookings report shows all bookings that were cancelled prior to delivery.

Select the report period required by specifying the start and end date in the format shown.

Click the calendar icon or use the date dropdown boxes to select the report dates.

Click generate report to retrieve data. Click the Information button to display details of an individual consignment. Sort displayed data by clicking on column headers.

Click re-select report filter to change the reporting period.

ReportClass.Value: Product reports provide information about the products that are available to order.

Report.Value:
The Product History report lists all products and displays the activity recorded for a selected product.

List all products or search product descriptions to display a list of matching products. Click column headers to sort the list.

Click export product list to excel to export a list of products to Excel.
Report.Tooltip: Click to display the Product History Report

Report.Value:
The Product Usage Report lists, for each product, the number of items that have been despatched during the selected period.

Select the report period required by specifying the start and end date in the format shown.

Click the calendar icon or use the date dropdown boxes to select the report dates.

Click generate report to retrieve data. Sort displayed data by clicking on column headers.

Click re-select report filter to change the reporting period.
Report.Tooltip: Click to display the Product Usage Report

Report.Value:
The Product Value Report lists, for each product, the number of items in stock and, where applicable, their monetary value. Archived products are not reported.

Click show all products to list all products, or use the search box to display a list of products with matching descriptions. Click column headers to sort the list.
Report.Tooltip: Click to display the Product Value Report

Report.Value: The Pallet Usage report shows monthly pallet usage.
